      • JsonDao

        public JsonDao(java.lang.String fileName,
               java.lang.reflect.Type type)
        Constructor to create new JsonDao
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file to be written to, filename is written to project's current directory
        type - Type of entity that is stored in the Dao, unfortunately Gson cannot unmarshall generics back into the correct type without this field
